item.title: How to Learn Backend Development
item.description: This tutorial will introduce how to learn backend development. (Python, Java, Ruby, C#, PHP, Monolithic architecture, Microservices architecture, Serverless architecture, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, Security, Performance)
